comprehensive_overview: RAPIDS is a suite of open-source software libraries and APIs built on NVIDIA CUDA for executing end-to-end data science and analytics pipelines entirely on GPUs. It allows for faster processing and analysis of big data.
core_features: 1. Accelerated data preprocessing, feature engineering, machine learning, and graph analytics. 2. Integration with popular data science and machine learning tools like scikit-learn, XGBoost, and Dask. 3. Support for multi-GPU deployment. 4. Seamless integration with Apache Arrow for efficient data interchange.
